name: Fresh Fruit Bowl
description: Fresh seasonal fruit served with your yoghurt.

name: French Toast
description: Served with cinnamon sugar, streaky bacon, banana and maple syrup.

name: Pancakes
description: Laced with maple syrup, berry compote and cream.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: Poached eggs and streaky bacon served on English muffins with lemon hollandaise.

name: B.E.T
description: Streaky bacon, two fried eggs and tomatoes on toast.

name: Sweet Corn Fritters
description: With streaky bacon, roast tomatoes and red pepper relish.

name: The Big Breakfast
description: Streaky bacon, two eggs, tomato, Portobello mushroom, black pudding, hash brown and kransky sausages on toast.

name: Omelette
description: Choice of two fillings: bacon, tomato, cheese, mushroom or sausage served with toast.

name: Toast or English Muffins
description: Served with butter and berry jam.

name: Sides
description: As an extra to any breakfast add hash brown, tomatoes, mushrooms, streaky bacon, black pudding kransky sausages or French toast.
